name: Sceal: An Irish Folklore Adventure
description: The spirit of a little girl wanders the pages of a magical story book, searching for her lost memories, painting the world around her as she uncovers the fragments of her forgotten life.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win XP Processor: Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 7 Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
